description.lang: PD-100 Plug in Dimmer Module Works with any AC operated lamps with incandescent and dimmable florescent(CFL) or LED light bulbs ON/OFF status and location LED indicator Can be controlled wirelessly or manually Plug and play, simple setup Lightweight and compact.Grounded 3-pin AC power plug to enhance safetyOver-The-Air firmware upgrade available with compatible gateway, Z-Wave static controller, PC and software Z-Wave 500 Series module inside Internal resettable fuse to protect from surge current Manual reset capability Adjustable dimming rate
Lifeline association only supports the u0022manual resetu0022 event.

Indicates the time duration of each level. Each unit has 10 msec of duration.3 means that the default is set at 30 msec.By adjusting the parameter values of 9 and 10, user can control how fine or fast they can control the dim levels.
For every unit increase or descrease, the duration is increased or decreased by 10msec.Higher the number, slower the duration it takes to adjust the dim level.
This parameter controls the operation of the LED backlight in conjunction with the operating state of the switch.
LED indicator turns ON when the connected appliance is ON.LED indciator will be OFF when the connected appliance is OFF.
When the connected appliance is OFF, the LED indicator will be ON. When the connected appliance is ON, the LED indicator will be OFF.
Key switch LED backlight is always OFF.
Indicates the number of steps the lighting brightness level will change as timer runs out when pressing the rocker switch up or down.
Set preferred increments of levels.Higher the number the faster the device will change brightness level.
